knowledge.name: open_ragbench (arXiv, 3k QA pairs)
knowledge.description: 3,000+ QA pairs sourced from arXiv papers for evaluating RAG systems. Covers scientific domains with grounded answers for retrieval-augmented generation benchmarking.

knowledge.name: rag-dataset-1200 (general purpose)
knowledge.description: 1,200 question-answer pairs for training and evaluating RAG pipelines across diverse general-knowledge topics.

knowledge.name: financial-rag-embedding (NVIDIA, 7k+ QA)
knowledge.description: 7,000+ financial QA pairs from NVIDIA for training RAG embedding models on finance-domain documents, earnings calls, and reports.

knowledge.name: ragas-wikiqa
knowledge.description: Wikipedia-based QA dataset formatted for RAGAS evaluation framework. Assess faithfulness, answer relevancy, and context precision of RAG pipelines.

knowledge.name: rag-hallucination-dataset-1000
knowledge.description: 1,000 adversarial examples designed to trigger hallucinations in RAG systems. Use to stress-test retrieval-augmented generation for factual accuracy.

knowledge.name: STaRK (NeurIPS 2024)
knowledge.description: NeurIPS 2024 benchmark for semi-structured knowledge graph retrieval. Covers Amazon products, biomedical data, and academic paper graphs for LLM evaluation.

knowledge.name: financial-knowledge-base-rag
knowledge.description: Financial knowledge base dataset optimised for RAG pipelines. Covers investment concepts, market terminology, and structured Q&A from financial documents.

knowledge.name: Langchain-Chatchat (local KB + RAG)

knowledge.name: t2-ragbench (23k+ rows)
knowledge.description: 23,000+ row RAG benchmark with diverse documents and questions for measuring retrieval quality and answer generation across multiple domains.

knowledge.name: LlamaHub (300+ data loaders)
knowledge.description: A library of data loaders for LLMs made by the community -- to be used with LlamaIndex and/or LangChain
